sentences.sContent: He trudge three hour in the snow to get back home.
sentences.sContent_eng: He trudge three hour in the snow to get back home.
sentences.sCn: 他在雪中跋涉三个钟点才回到家。

sentences.sContent: Through trudge, he comes to bazaar with the elder brother eventually.
sentences.sContent_eng: Through trudge, he comes to bazaar with the elder brother eventually.
sentences.sCn: 经过长途跋涉，他终于和哥哥来到市集。
